definition[0]: a standard piece of writing or a design for something that can be easily used each time you need it, for example in business or legal documents
example[0]: a boilerplate for a fax message
definition[1]: an agreement, contract etc with standard wording
example[2]: Another piece of boilerplate that it is probably useful to include is one relating to confidentiality.
example[3]: boilerplate contract terms that can be transferred from scheme to scheme to cut costs
